metadata.title: Our Team
metadata.description: Meet the talented researchers driving innovation in our lab

data.name: Wen Fan
data.description: Wen received his MSc degree in xx from the University of Manchester in 2021. He obtained his B.E. degree in xxx from Hefei University of Technology at 2020.  His main research interest xxx.

data.name: Jialin Lin
data.description: Jialin received his MSc degree in xx from the University of Bristol in 2022. He obtained his B.E. degree in xxx from Dalian University of Technology at 2021.  His main research interest xxx.

data.name: Lan Wei
data.description: Lan received her M.E. degree in Computer Science from the University of Science and Technology of China in 2024. She obtained her B.E. degree in Computer Science from Xiamen University in 2021.  Her main research interest is machine learning-based perception of optical microrobots.

data.name: Zongcai Tan
data.description: Zongcai received his MSc degree in xx from Imperial College London in 2024. He obtained his B.E. degree in xxx from Jilin University at 2023.  His main research interest xxx.

data.name: Kangyi Lu
data.description: Kangyi received her M.E. degree in xxx from the Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2024. She obtained her B.E. degree in xxx from xx in 2021.  Her main research interest is xxx.

data.name: Liu Yan
data.description: Working on federated learning and privacy-preserving AI systems. Developing secure protocols for distributed machine learning across multiple institutions.

data.name: Wang Yu
data.description: Specializing in natural language processing and transformer models. Working on large language models for multilingual applications and cross-modal understanding.

data.name: Hans Mueller
data.description: Visiting from ETH Zurich, specializing in robotic manipulation and haptic feedback systems. Collaborating on our dexterous manipulation projects.
